-- | Provides PAM authentication module
--   
--   Provides PAM authentication module that simply lets a user specify
--   his/her identifier.
--   
--   This is not intended for real world use, just for private network.
@package yesod-auth-pam
@version 1.0.0.0

module Yesod.Auth.Pam
authPam :: AuthPlugin master
